verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> reigned וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> two שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and when he had reigned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel

וַיִּבְחַר־ <S%H977><s%> chose ל֨וֹ שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> him three אֲלָפִים֮ <S%H505><s%> thousand מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> [men] of Israel וַיִּהְי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> were with שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> were with Saul אַלְפַּ֗יִם <S%H505><s%> [whereof] two thousand בְּמִכְמָשׂ֙ <S%H4363><s%> in Michmash וּבְהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> and in mount בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> Bethel וְאֶ֗לֶף <S%H505><s%> and a thousand הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> were with י֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3129><s%> were with Jonathan בְּגִבְעַ֖ת <S%H1390><s%> in Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ין <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וְיֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> and the rest הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people שִׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> he sent אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <S%H168><s%> to his tent

וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> smote יוֹנָתָ֗ן <S%H3129><s%> And Jonathan אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> נְצִ֤יב <S%H5333><s%> the garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that was בְּגֶ֔בַע <S%H1387><s%> that [was] in Geba וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines וְשָׁאוּל֩ <S%H7586><s%> [of it] And Saul תָּקַ֨ע <S%H8628><s%> blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֤ר <S%H7782><s%> the trumpet בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> throughout הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> throughout all the land לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> hear הָעִבְרִֽים׃ <S%H5680><s%> Let the Hebrews

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יִשְׂרָאֵ֞ל <S%H3478><s%> And all Israel שָׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> say הִכָּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> had smitten שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> [that] Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְצִ֣יב <S%H5333><s%> a garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also נִבְאַשׁ <S%H887><s%> also was had in abomination יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and [that] Israel בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> with the Philistines וַיִּצָּעֲק֥וּ <S%H6817><s%> were called together הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul הַגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <S%H1537><s%> to Gilgal

וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֞ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines נֶאֶסְפ֣וּ ׀ <S%H622><s%> gathered themselves together לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> with Israel שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand רֶ֙כֶב֙ <S%H7393><s%> chariots וְשֵׁ֤שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> and six אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand פָּרָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6571><s%> horsemen וְעָ֕ם <S%H5971><s%> and people כַּח֛וֹל <S%H2344><s%> as the sand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׂפַֽת־ <S%H8193><s%> shore הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> which [is] on the sea לָרֹ֑ב <S%H7230><s%> in multitude וַֽיַּעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> and they came up וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְמִכְמָ֔שׂ <S%H4363><s%> in Michmash קִדְמַ֖ת <S%H6926><s%> eastward בֵּ֥ית אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H1007><s%> from Bethaven

וְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> When the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel רָאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> saw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for צַר־ <S%H6862><s%> A strait ל֔וֹ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִגַּ֖שׂ <S%H5065><s%> were distressed הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> (for the people וַיִּֽתְחַבְּא֣וּ <S%H2244><s%> did hide הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ) then the people בַּמְּעָר֤וֹת <S%H4631><s%> themselves in caves וּבַֽחֲוָחִים֙ <S%H2336><s%> thickets וּבַסְּלָעִ֔ים <S%H5553><s%> and in rocks וּבַצְּרִחִ֖ים <S%H6877><s%> and in high places וּבַבֹּרֽוֹת׃ <S%H953><s%> and in pits

וְעִבְרִ֗ים <S%H5680><s%> And [some of] the Hebrews עָֽבְרוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> went over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the land גָּ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וְגִלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> and Gilead וְשָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> As for Saul עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> he still בַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> he [was] yet in Gilgal וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people חָרְד֥וּ <S%H2729><s%> him trembling אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> followed

[וַיִּיחֶל כ] (וַיֹּ֣וחֶל <S%H3176><s%> cause to ק) שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days לַמּוֹעֵד֙ <S%H4150><s%> according to the set time אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> set שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> that Samuel וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> came שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> [had appointed] but Samuel הַגִּלְגָּ֑ל <S%H1537><s%> not to Gilgal וַיָּ֥פֶץ <S%H6327><s%> were scattered הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul הַגִּ֣שׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> Bring hither אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering וְהַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> to me and peace offerings וַיַּ֖עַל <S%H5927><s%> And he offered הָעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּכַלֹּתוֹ֙ <S%H3615><s%> And it came to pass that as soon as he had made an end לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> of offering הָעֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> behold Samuel בָּ֑א <S%H935><s%> came וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went out שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Saul לִקְרָאת֖וֹ <S%H7122><s%> to meet לְבָרֲכֽוֹ׃ <S%H1288><s%> him that he might salute

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel מֶ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What עָשִׂ֑יתָ <S%H6213><s%> What hast thou done וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֡וּל <S%H7586><s%> ? And Saul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because רָאִיתִי֩ <S%H7200><s%> Because I saw כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because נָפַ֨ץ <S%H5310><s%> were scattered הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> that the people מֵעָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> and וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not בָ֙אתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> from me and [that] thou camest לְמוֹעֵ֣ד <S%H4150><s%> appointed הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> not within the days וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> and [that] the Philistines נֶאֱסָפִ֥ים <S%H622><s%> gathered themselves together מִכְמָֽשׂ׃ <S%H4363><s%> at Michmash

וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore said עַ֠תָּה <S%H6258><s%> Now יֵרְד֨וּ <S%H3381><s%> will come down פְלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <S%H6430><s%> I The Philistines אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> against הַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> now upon me to Gilgal וּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> unto יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not חִלִּ֑יתִי <S%H2470><s%> and I have not made supplication וָֽאֶתְאַפַּ֔ק <S%H662><s%> I forced וָאַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> myself therefore and offered הָעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering ס

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> to Saul נִסְכָּ֑לְתָּ <S%H5528><s%> Thou hast done foolishly לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁמַ֗רְתָּ <S%H8104><s%> thou hast not kept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוַ֞ת <S%H4687><s%> the commandment יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֔ךְ <S%H6680><s%> which he commanded כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now הֵכִ֨ין <S%H3559><s%> have established יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> thee for now would the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַֽמְלַכְתְּךָ֛ <S%H4467><s%> thy kingdom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> upon Israel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now מַמְלַכְתְּךָ֣ <S%H4467><s%> But now thy kingdom לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָק֑וּם <S%H6965><s%> shall not continue בִּקֵּשׁ֩ <S%H1245><s%> hath sought יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3069><s%> God ל֜וֹ אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> him a man כִּלְבָב֗וֹ <S%H3824><s%> after his own heart וַיְצַוֵּ֨הוּ <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3069><s%> God לְנָגִיד֙ <S%H5057><s%> him [to be] captain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> over his people כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁמַ֔רְתָּ <S%H8104><s%> because thou hast not kept אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what צִוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God פ

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel וַיַּ֛עַל <S%H5927><s%> and gat him up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <S%H1537><s%> from Gilgal גִּבְעַ֣ת <S%H1390><s%> unto Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וַיִּפְקֹ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> numbered שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> the people הַנִּמְצְאִ֣ים <S%H4672><s%> [that were] present עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> about כְּשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> with him about six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וְשָׁא֞וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul וְיוֹנָתָ֣ן <S%H3129><s%> and Jonathan בְּנ֗וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְהָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and the people הַנִּמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> [that were] present עִמָּ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> them יֹשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> with them abode בְּגֶ֣בַע <S%H1387><s%> in Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> but the Philistines חָנ֥וּ <S%H2583><s%> encamped בְמִכְמָֽשׂ׃ <S%H4363><s%> in Michmash

וַיֵּצֵ֧א <S%H3318><s%> came out הַמַּשְׁחִ֛ית <S%H7843><s%> And the spoilers מִמַּחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> in three רָאשִׁ֑ים <S%H7218><s%> companies הָרֹ֨אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> company אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> one יִפְנֶ֛ה <S%H6437><s%> turned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> unto the way עָפְרָ֖ה <S%H6084><s%> [that leadeth to] Ophrah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land שׁוּעָֽל׃ <S%H7777><s%> of Shual
